entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
